Comment: 400 pages of lies, citing the likes of the NYT and Cass, to lay the groundwork to justify banning trans healthcare for youth first (that they define as individuals under 26!) and then certainly for all other adults. Any news org that gives this report credence (especially in headlines, looking at you Axios, PBS, AP) is complicit in the eradication of trans people in the US. This will only harm us. If you're cis you need to speak out against this at every opportunity or you too are complicit.
